name: Cyclops Ride Assist
description: Ongoing mechatronics capstone project which provides real-time bicycle crash detection and approaching object monitoring.

name: Pacemaker
description: A pacemaker designed using simulink and built on the K64F MCU. A rest api was built using Express, MongoDB, and Node.JS

name: Digital Signal Processing
description: An FIR filter was designed by analyzing audio samples in matlab. Then an echo machine was implemented using shift registers.

name: Embedded Cooling System
description: A digital thermometer circuit was constructed to interface with a microcontroller. A fan was triggered to cool ambient conditions when a desired temperature was exceeded.

name: Old Website
description: First attempt at front end web development. Built using HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

name: Prosthetic Hand
description: Designed and simulated a two-finger prosthetic hand and geartrain of specified ratio under strict size constraints. The components were then sliced, 3D printed, sanded, lubed, and assembled to create a functional prosthetic hand.

name: Door Accessibility Device
description: A basic device making use of the positive relationship between torque and radius was conceptualized. Engineering drawings were made, and a 3D model was created in Inventor. A proof of concept, low fidelity, prototype was created. A high fidelity, lightweight, and robust final product was created and delivered.

name: SDS Online Library
description: Made use of the free online cloud storage to create a high-quality safety data sheet repository. Presented the project to Hoffer Mechanical employees in conjunction with one on one technological support to resolve any issues. Created a tutorial on drive maintenance along with a dating system.
